statements: UPDATE InterviewFeedback SET interviewer = 'John Doe', overall_rating = 4 WHERE interview_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE InterviewFeedback SET interview_feedback = 'Great communication skills demonstrated' WHERE candidate_id = '98765432-1234-5678-9123-456789012345';

UPDATE InterviewFeedback SET interview_feedback = 'Great performance by the candidate.', overall_rating = 9 WHERE interview_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND candidate_id = '09876543-21bc-4def-9876-abcdef123456';

UPDATE InterviewFeedback SET interviewer = 'John Doe', feedback_date = '2022-03-15 10:00:00' WHERE candidate_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890' AND interview_id = '98765432-10dc-4f3b-a987-6543210def12';
UPDATE interviews SET feedback = 'Positive feedback received' WHERE interview_id = '3b42adcc-29d7-4f94-9b70-89f3198c7faa';
UPDATE hiring_teams SET team_size = 8, team_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE team_id = '1d7be245-0c95-456e-bb0c-17ce23b40c05';
UPDATE interviews SET feedback = 'Good performance' WHERE interview_id = '4a4aa365-9346-4725-82f9-4b6f7ab93d6a';
UPDATE hiring_teams SET team_email = 'newemail@example.com', team_size = 8 WHERE team_id = 'a9d9b8b2-40a5-4a31-9c37-097c07e85a2e';
UPDATE InterviewSchedule SET interview_date = '2021-10-15', interview_time = '09:00:00', room_number = 101 WHERE interview_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Feedback SET feedback_text = 'Overall, the candidate performed well.', rating = 4 WHERE feedback_id = '456e7899-e89b-23d4-b567-426614175500';
UPDATE InterviewSchedule SET interview_date = '2022-08-15', interview_time = '15:30:00', room_number = 101 WHERE interview_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Feedback SET feedback_text = 'Good candidate with strong communication skills', rating = 4 WHERE feedback_id = '78901234-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE InterviewSchedules SET interviewer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE interview_id = 101
UPDATE Candidates SET candidate_phone = '+1-123-456-7890', candidate_resume = 'Updated resume text' WHERE candidate_id = 201
UPDATE InterviewSchedules SET candidate_name = 'John Doe', interview_time = '09:00:00' WHERE interview_id = 123
UPDATE HiringTeams SET team_name = 'Engineering Team', team_lead = 'Alice Smith' WHERE team_id = 456
UPDATE interview_schedules SET feedback = 'Great performance in the interview' WHERE interview_id = 1;
UPDATE hiring_teams SET team_lead = 'Jane Doe' WHERE team_id = 2;
UPDATE interview_schedules SET feedback = 'Great candidate, recommend for further rounds' WHERE interview_id = 12345;
UPDATE interview_feedback SET rating = 4, feedback_text = 'Good communication skills, can improve technical knowledge' WHERE feedback_id = 54321;
